typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		source_code_key as string,
		source_system as string,
		target_code as string,
		target_description as string,
		code_type_id as double,
		code2 as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		code_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
TCrossReference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 198) ~> FInancialType198
FInancialType198 select(mapColumn(
		exp_key = source_code_key,
		exp_code = target_code,
		exp_description = target_description,
		exp_cost_compensation = code2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FinancialType
TCrossReference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 828) ~> ExpenseCostGroup828
ExpenseCostGroup828 select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key,
		ext_code = target_code,
		ext_description = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
TCrossReference filter(source_system == 'PARIS' && code_type_id == 827) ~> ExpenseGroup827
ExpenseGroup827 select(mapColumn(
		source_code_key,
		exg_code = target_code,
		exg_description = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
